text: T/O CONCURRENCY CONTROL Use timestamps to determine the serializability order of txns. If TS(T;) < TS(T;), then the DBMS must ensure that the execution schedule is equivalent to a serial schedule where T; appears before T. | S | ‘) 3:54/1:20:37 - TIO CONCURRENCY CONTROL > [cc & ( |£] Ly CMU Database Systems - 18 Timestamp Ordering Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
